text: was a Japanese philanthropist and businessman. He was the founder of Kyocera and KDDI. He was the chairman of Japan Airlines. Inamori was elected as a member into the National Academy of Engineering in 2000. Inamori died on 24 August 2022 in Kyoto City, Japan at the age of 90.Charismatic business leader Kazuo Inamori, founder of Kyocera, dies at 90 ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Japanese businesspeople
title: Kazuo Inamori
